articles.author: Ewan Murray
articles.title: Bernd Wiesberger closes in on Ryder Cup spot but race goes on at Wentworth - The Guardian
articles.description: Bernd Wiesberger looks set to seal a spot in Europe’s Ryder Cup team thanks to a composed showing in the PGA Championship at Wentworth, with a complex race also still in progress for wildcard places
articles.content:
European Tour
  • Austrian needs top-50 finish in PGA Championship to seal place
  • Shane Lowry and Lee Westwood still in complex battle for spots

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: China's Xi discusses ties, Afghanistan in phone call with Merkel - The Star Online
articles.description: BEIJING (Reuters): China's President Xi Jinping urged Germany to promote a "correct" policy towards China within the European Union in a phone call with German Chancellor Angela Merkel, according to a Chinese state media report on Friday (Sept 10).
